http://arstechnica.com/gaming/news/2011/08/ars-guide-how-to-ruin-your-pc-port-in-five-easy-steps.ars

Bizarrely, PC gaming is starting to feel more constricted and "less open" than console gaming.  :-|
I hate it when it does that.

I find myself swinging more towards the PC again as of late, especially after I did a bit of an upgrade. 

These are all valid points, my biggest bitch is the lazy ports, where you basically have to use the controller to really play the game. 

I imagine these issues will really go away fast. It's easy to port over to the PC, and you don't have to worry about optimising too much, since the PC now has more processing power then the consoles.
